definition: an aggressive remark directed at a person like a missile and intended to have a telling effect, to move the stern of a sailing vessel across the wind, causing the boom to sweep from one side of the boat to the other
details:
noun
- an aggressive remark directed at a person like a missile and intended to have a telling effect
= example: an aggressive remark directed at a person like a missile and intended to have a telling effect
= synonyms: barb
verb
- to move the stern of a sailing vessel across the wind, causing the boom to sweep from one side of the boat to the other
= example: to move the stern of a sailing vessel across the wind, causing the boom to sweep from one side of the boat to the other
= synonyms: jib
- to be compatible, similar or consistent
= example: to be compatible, similar or consistent
= synonyms: tally
